headline: 5 Must-Read Analyst Questions From BD’s Q4 Earnings Call
summary: Becton, Dickinson and Company’s fourth quarter results were shaped by ongoing portfolio transformation, targeted investments in growth platforms, and the headwind of international tariffs. Management credited strong performance in biologic drug delivery, advanced tissue regeneration, and pharmacy automation, with CEO Thomas E.
